rooms.description: Spacious entrance area with minimalistic design that adheres to Vastu principles. Natural light and open space are prioritized.
Open living area with large windows for natural light, aligning with minimalist aesthetics and communal gathering space.
Adjacent to the kitchen, designed as a small dining area that complements the living room.
Modern minimalist kitchen with efficient layout and Vastu-friendly positioning.
Spacious master bedroom located in a prime location to maximize positive energy according to Vastu principles. Includes ensuite bathroom.
Well-appointed second bedroom for additional family members or guests, designed with open space and minimalistic elements.
Dedicated area for servants, ensuring privacy while remaining accessible to the household.
Additional bathroom facility located near the living areas for guests.
